The patient has no regional lymph node metastasis (pN0), and there is no evidence of distant metastases (pM). The patient's clinical history and pre-operative diagnosis indicate that they are an ex-smoker with a 1.6 cm RUL nodule, 3.7 cm LLL ground-glass mass, and a 1 cm lingular nodule.
